doc.course_introduction:
This course explores Excel as a tool for solving business problems. In this course you will learn the basic functions of excel through guided demonstration. Each week you will build on your excel skills and be provided an opportunity to practice what youâ€™ve learned. Finally, you will have a chance to put your knowledge to work in a final project. Please note, the content in this course was developed using a Windows version of Excel 2013.
This course was created by PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP with an address at 300 Madison Avenue, New York, New York, 10017.

doc.reviews: ['Best course to learn excel from the beginning.', "Great for a beginner, especially for those just starting their career life as an intern. Also a wonderful enlightment for data analysis and related fields. I'm considering a more analysis-oriented major after the undergraduate. Thought I knew how to use Excel but I actually didn't. A must course for every beginner who want to enter into basic analytics. Thank you PWC for providing such modules. Looking forward for more', 'Good course from a respected company. The assignments realistic and challenging, and can be finished in the estimated time for the course.', 'Very useful and practical.', 'An amazing course with very interactive video lessons and exercises that made sure that candidates were equipped with good knowledge by the end of the course. Thank You for the opportunity', 'Good quality with reasonable length !!! ', 'v', 'One of the most useful courses I have taken. Skills immediately applicable on any job that requires data analysis.', 'Excellent content coverage and explanation.', 'Niceee', "Problem solving is what they call it, but I call it excel nitty gritty. if you don't know this you don't know anything at all. Highly recommended for all those who wish to kisck start their data career. ', 'A very thorough course that provides easy instructions on basic to complex excel formulas as well as tips. ', 'The functions introduced in this course are very useful for me to utilize the excel in my academic studies and I also think this will help me to develop greatly in my future career.', 'Good information delivered and great opportunities to do with example problems. ', 'This course really helped in understanding the usage of Excel tool. The professionals who taught the course were brilliant. Thank you sir, for taking out the time from your busy schedule and create this wonderful course. ', 'good course with a lot of practical and helpful excel skills!', "There's something for everyone in this course. If you are a student, working through this course as early in your career may improve your grades, but will certainly let you produce higher-quality work with less time and struggle on your part. Ditto for entry-level professionals. If you have been doing it longer, like I have, you will be reminded of some important things you have forgotten, but more importantly you will pick up some tips to make future work also higher quality with less work. Highly Recommended.", 'This course was a great refresher course for me. I had intermediate Excel skills but needed to put all the components together.
